name: Easy Platform (or not)
description:
Surprize! It's not a horror game!!!

This game is still in development but this is a (nearly) full featured version.

Intro

Let me introduce to you: Eva, who looks like a capsule.(To be honest i got that idea from Wall-E) She was a robot and she loves fruit (I know it is weird - How the hell can a robot EAT?!). One day, she fall into a rabbit hole (Sorry about that, Lewis Carroll), and she found herself in a weird place (of course it is! I mean, even a robot cannot see sky deep in the rabbit hole!) . She saw a door high up on a platform. It looks very mystic. (In the real life, REMEMBER NOT to follow the rabbit like Alice or Neo - and the most important: do not enter any unknown doors!) She decided to explore this place. (TOTALLY BAD DECISION)

So this game, is all about her adventure, just download it (OR, play in browser, which is coming soon), and have fun!

Some hint

Since it takes a long time to build the project on WebGL, the web version will be less frequently updated. Therefore, the game version in browser might be a little older than Download version.
